entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
